### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=0.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab at position(x=0.5, y=0.5) connected to power infrastructure with ElectricityGroup(id=681, poles=[(x=8.5,y=9.5),(x=2.5,y=2.5),(x=4.5,y=5.5)], voltage=0)

### Iron plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
- Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
- Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0) 
- Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0) 
- Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Coal storage at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5)
Consists of wooden chest at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5) with coal

### Coal storage at position(x=43.5, y=-81.5)
Consists of wooden chest at position(x=43.5, y=-81.5) with coal and iron plates

### Inserter at position(x=3.5, y=0.5)
Consists of burner inserter at position(x=3.5, y=0.5) connected to wooden chest at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placement, as some tiles may be occupied by other entities or part of the terrain may be unplaceable (water)

### Errors when inserting items
- Make sure you have the item to insert in your inventory before attempting insertion
- Ensure the entity you are trying to insert into can accept the item

### Errors when setting research
- Ensure the research technology is valid and available before attempting to set it

### Errors when using timeouts
- Avoid using sleep or other timeout functions to prevent the agent from freezing or becoming unresponsive

### Errors when connecting to power infrastructure
- Ensure the lab is properly connected to the power infrastructure before attempting to use it

### Errors when mining or smelting
- Ensure the mining drill or furnace has the necessary fuel and ingredients before attempting to mine or smelt

### Errors when using burners
- Ensure the burner has the necessary fuel before attempting to use it
